org.forgerock.openam.auditors

Class SMSAuditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.auditors.ConfigAuditor
      • org.forgerock.openam.auditors.SMSAuditor

  • public class SMSAuditor
extends ConfigAuditor
    Responsible for publishing audit config events for an SMS operation.
    Since:
    13.0.0

    • Constructor Detail

      • SMSAuditor

        @Inject
public SMSAuditor(@Named(value="amSMS")
                          Debug debug,
                          AuditEventPublisher auditEventPublisher,
                          AuditEventFactory auditEventFactory,
                          SSOToken runAs,
                          @Nullable
                          String realm,
                          String objectId,
                          Map<String,Object> initialState,
                          Set<SMSAuditFilter> filters)
        Creates the base for an SMSAuditor
        Parameters:
        debug - The debugger
        auditEventPublisher - The publisher being used
        auditEventFactory - The factory used to create the EventBuilder
        runAs - The user that the configuration was run as
        realm - The realm the configuration takes place in
        objectId - The id (e.g. dn) of the object being configured
        initialState - The initialState of the object being configured
        filters - The filters used to determine if the event should be audited

    • Method Detail

      • auditModify

        public void auditModify(ModificationItem[] mods)
        Audits modify operations, using the structure passed in to the SMS operation to establish the final state.
        Parameters:
        mods - The list of modifications being applied

      • getRealmFromDN

        public static String getRealmFromDN(String dn)
        Extract the realm from the LDAP DN
        Parameters:
        dn - The DN from which to extract the realm
        Returns:
        The extracted realm's name
